## Description {#details}

This file is part of the WebAssembly Assembler.

It contains code to translate a parsed .s file into MCInsts.

<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    Stack.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
